languages.text: "Касс, зная Лорд-капитана, не стану тебя обнадеживать... Просто отнесись к этому как к экзотической экскурсии".

traits.locale_text: "Касс, зная Лорд-капитана, не стану тебя обнадеживать... Просто отнесись к этому как к экзотической экскурсии".

languages.text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."
languages.original_text: "Касс, зная Лорд-капитана, не стану тебя обнадеживать... Просто отнесись к этому как к экзотической экскурсии".

traits.locale_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."
"Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

"Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

languages.text: «Cass, conociendo a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, no me haría muchas ilusiones... Piensa en esto como una escapada exótica».
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

traits.locale_text: «Cass, conociendo a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, no me haría muchas ilusiones... Piensa en esto como una escapada exótica».

languages.text: 「カシアちゃん、ロード・キャプテンのことだから、期待はしない方がいいかもね...ただの、異国情緒あふれる外出とでも思って」
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

traits.locale_text: 「カシアちゃん、ロード・キャプテンのことだから、期待はしない方がいいかもね...ただの、異国情緒あふれる外出とでも思って」

languages.text: “别抱希望就对了，小卡，你也知道舰长大人是什么样的人……就把这当成一场充满异国情调的旅行吧。”
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

traits.locale_text: “别抱希望就对了，小卡，你也知道舰长大人是什么样的人……就把这当成一场充满异国情调的旅行吧。”

languages.text: "Cass, wie ich den Lord Captain kenne, würde ich darauf nicht hoffen ... Stellt Euch das Ganze einfach wie einen exotischen Ausflug vor."
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

traits.locale_text: "Cass, wie ich den Lord Captain kenne, würde ich darauf nicht hoffen ... Stellt Euch das Ganze einfach wie einen exotischen Ausflug vor."

languages.text: « Cass, ma chère, {mf|tel|telle} que je connais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, je ne me ferais pas trop d'illusions, à votre place... Voyez cela comme une petite escapade pittoresque. »
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."

traits.locale_text: « Cass, ma chère, {mf|tel|telle} que je connais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, je ne me ferais pas trop d'illusions, à votre place... Voyez cela comme une petite escapade pittoresque. »

languages.text: "Cass, Lord Kaptan'ı tanırsın. Bence çok da umutlanmamaya çalış... Bunu egzotik bir gezi olarak düşün."
languages.original_text: "Cass, knowing the Lord Captain, I wouldn't get my hopes up... Just think of it as an exotic outing."
